column2: Guerrilla Interception
column3: Guerrilla Interception

column2: The {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} convoy is inbound, Commander.
column3: The {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} convoy is inbound, Commander.

column2: Let's get eyes on, and intercept the vehicles before they escape the trap.
column3: Let's get eyes on, and intercept the vehicles before they escape the trap.

column2: Then we'll extract at our designated location.
column3: Then we'll extract at our designated location.

column2: Good luck, Commander. Oliveira out.
column3: Good luck, Commander. Oliveira out.

column2: Well done, Commander. Let's debrief back in orbit.
column3: Well done, Commander. Let's debrief back in orbit.

column2: What a mess. Time to call this one off, Commander. I'm scrubbing the mission.
column3: What a mess. Time to call this one off, Commander. I'm scrubbing the mission.

column2: We have a lock on the target vehicles. They should be to your front. Engage and destroy, Commander.
column3: We have a lock on the target vehicles. They should be to your front. Engage and destroy, Commander.

column2: That's got it, keep firing on those targets until they are neutralized.
column3: That's got it, keep firing on those targets until they are neutralized.

column2: Convoy guards are all down. Let's finish up and get out of here.
column3: Convoy guards are all down. Let's finish up and get out of here.

column2: The convoy is reaching its escape point, Commander. We're running out of time. Step it up!
column3: The convoy is reaching its escape point, Commander. We're running out of time. Step it up!

column2: One down. Keep engaging those threats and we'll be out of here.
column3: One down. Keep engaging those threats and we'll be out of here.

column2: The convoy is finished, now get what mechs you have to the extraction point and we'll pull you out. Move quickly.
column3: The convoy is finished, now get what mechs you have to the extraction point and we'll pull you out. Move quickly.

column2: Enemy Reinforcements, get ready for contact.
column3: Enemy Reinforcements, get ready for contact.

column2: Commander, this smells political, and that makes me nervous. I suggest we go in, take care of the convoy, and get out again - without asking too many questions. There's a bonus if we clean up all the enemy forces, but that's at your discretion.
column3: Commander, this smells political, and that makes me nervous. I suggest we go in, take care of the convoy, and get out again - without asking too many questions. There's a bonus if we clean up all the enemy forces, but that's at your discretion.

column2: Guerrilla strikes against our facilities have increased, and our intel says {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} is bankrolling the guerrillas and providing logistical support in the form of small arms, explosives, and medical supplies. We need you to intercept the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} supply convoy and destroy it before it reaches the guerrilla forces.
column3: Guerrilla strikes against our facilities have increased, and our intel says {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} is bankrolling the guerrillas and providing logistical support in the form of small arms, explosives, and medical supplies. We need you to intercept the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} supply convoy and destroy it before it reaches the guerrilla forces.

column2: Hostile Acquisitions
column3: Hostile Acquisitions

column2: To intercept the convoy we'll need to identify their route.
column3: To intercept the convoy we'll need to identify their route.

column2: Let's move up and get eyes on the targets. When contact is made, we hit them hard before they reach their destination.
column3: Let's move up and get eyes on the targets. When contact is made, we hit them hard before they reach their destination.

column2: Then we extract at our designated evac zone.
column3: Then we extract at our designated evac zone.

column2: Good luck, Commander.
column3: Good luck, Commander.

column2: The material has been destroyed and our job here is done. Solid work, Commander.
column3: The material has been destroyed and our job here is done. Solid work, Commander.

column2: We haven't stopped the material shipment, Commander. I'll notify our {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} rep.
column3: We haven't stopped the material shipment, Commander. I'll notify our {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} rep.

column2: We have a lock on the target vehicles. They should be to your front. Engage and destroy, Commander.
column3: We have a lock on the target vehicles. They should be to your front. Engage and destroy, Commander.

column2: That's got it, keep firing on those targets until they are neutralized.
column3: That's got it, keep firing on those targets until they are neutralized.

column2: The {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} escorts are out of commission, Commander. Our employers will be pleased with the extra carnage.
column3: The {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} escorts are out of commission, Commander. Our employers will be pleased with the extra carnage.

column2: Warning, Commander! The convoy has begun to arrive at their destination. There's not much time left to destroy the rest before we have to abort this mission.
column3: Warning, Commander! The convoy has begun to arrive at their destination. There's not much time left to destroy the rest before we have to abort this mission.

column2: One down. Keep engaging those threats and we'll be out of here.
column3: One down. Keep engaging those threats and we'll be out of here.

column2: Enemy Reinforcements, get ready for contact.
column3: Enemy Reinforcements, get ready for contact.

column2: Commander, this should be a pretty simple smash and run job. I expect {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} would do it themselves, but don't want to be blamed for the destruction of the goods. That's in our wheelhouse.
column3: Commander, this should be a pretty simple smash and run job. I expect {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} would do it themselves, but don't want to be blamed for the destruction of the goods. That's in our wheelhouse.

column2: A {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} convoy regularly transports rare minerals through the region. Our agents have acquired the convoy's travel plans so that you can ambush the convoy. We do not require that you recover the minerals. We just want to keep them out of the enemy's hands.
column3: A {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} convoy regularly transports rare minerals through the region. Our agents have acquired the convoy's travel plans so that you can ambush the convoy. We do not require that you recover the minerals. We just want to keep them out of the enemy's hands.

column2: We have a report that {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} has been operating a hidden surveillance base somewhere on {TGT_SYSTEM.Name}. Unfortunately, they intercepted our spies' reports and have evacuated the base, torching everything useful. We'd like to prevent any of the data they've collected from leaving the planet. We've been able to identify their likely evacuation route, and we need you to intercept their evac convoy and destroy it.
column3: We have a report that {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} has been operating a hidden surveillance base somewhere on {TGT_SYSTEM.Name}. Unfortunately, they intercepted our spies' reports and have evacuated the base, torching everything useful. We'd like to prevent any of the data they've collected from leaving the planet. We've been able to identify their likely evacuation route, and we need you to intercept their evac convoy and destroy it.

column3: Interdiction

column2: Then we'll extract at the designated location.

column2: There's nothing we can do to fix this one, Commander. I'll notify our employer that we're pulling out.

column2: We're tracking {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} supply convoys that have been delivering weapons and explosives to a self-appointed warlord here on {TGT_SYSTEM.name}. In return, his fighters have been wreaking havoc on {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} facilities in the region. We need you to interdict the convoy and destroy it.
column3: We're tracking {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} supply convoys that have been delivering weapons and explosives to a self-appointed warlord here on {TGT_SYSTEM.name}. column2: Once the shipment is destroyed, head to the evac zone. Oliveira out.
column3: Once the shipment is destroyed, head to the evac zone. Oliveira out.

column2: I've signaled to {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} that the shipment was 'lost,' as requested. Good work, Commander.

column2: This was a disaster, Commander. Let's head home.

column2: That's all the convoy guards down. Good job; that's money in the bank.

column2: Commander, the convoy is almost to the escape point. You'll need to push hard if you're going to save this mission.

column2: Once they're dealt with, head to the evac zone for pickup, or clear out the convoy's guards. Your call.

column3: Destroy {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Reinforcements

column2: Every month, {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} sends out another supply convoy loaded with military hardware and valuable electronics. They guard it heavily, so we're not asking you to hit the main force; no sense in throwing away good mercenaries. Instead we want you to pick off the tail end of the convoy. The cargo isn't as valuable as what they send out in the vanguard, but it won't be as heavily defended. Take the convoy out, and we'll send in our people to grab whatever's still intact. We don't really want to get shot at, so we'll pay a bonus if you take out all the defenders, as well.
column3: Every month, {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} sends out another supply convoy loaded with military hardware and valuable electronics. They guard it heavily, so we're not asking you to hit the main force; no sense in throwing away good mercenaries. Instead we want you to pick off the tail end of the convoy. The cargo isn't as valuable as what they send out in the vanguard, but it won't be as heavily defended. Take the convoy out, and we'll send in our people to grab whatever's still intact. We don't really want to get shot at, so we'll pay a bonus if you take out all the defenders, as well.

column2: Burden of Proof
column3: Burden of Proof

column2: All right, Commander, our goal is to track down the convoy...
column3: All right, Commander, our goal is to track down the convoy...

column2: ...so let's scout out the target area. When we've found the convoy, we stop it from reaching its destination.
column3: ...so let's scout out the target area. When we've found the convoy, we stop it from reaching its destination.

column2: Then we make our way to the evac zone.
column3: Then we make our way to the evac zone.

column2: Get to it, Commander.
column3: Get to it, Commander.

column2: Mission accomplished. Our employer's friend will likely slip the noose of the law now.
column3: Mission accomplished. Our employer's friend will likely slip the noose of the law now.

column2: Well, that didn't go as planned. I expect that our employer's friend will face what passes for justice now.

column2: A friend of our organization has been accused by {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} of illegal activities. While under this accusation, she's unable to perform her duties for {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} leadership. Evidence to be used in an upcoming hearing is being transported to a spaceport, for safe-keeping off-planet. Your team is to intercept this convoy and destroy it.

While under this accusation, she's unable to perform her duties for {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} leadership. column2: Repossession
column3: Repossession

column2: This is the only window we have for striking the convoy, Commander.
column3: This is the only window we have for striking the convoy, Commander.

column2: We'll need to recon the area. Once we find the convoy, we'll hit it hard and knock it out.
column3: We'll need to recon the area. Once we find the convoy, we'll hit it hard and knock it out.

column2: Once the targets are down, we'll rendezvous with the Leopard at the extraction point.
column3: Once the targets are down, we'll rendezvous with the Leopard at the extraction point.

column2: Let's do this by the numbers, Commander. Oliveira out.
column3: Let's do this by the numbers, Commander. Oliveira out.

column2: We've signaled the {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} salvage crews that they're clear to begin their work. Well done, Commander.
column3: We've signaled the {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} salvage crews that they're clear to begin their work. Well done, Commander.

column2: This is a disaster. Pulling out NOW, Commander.
column3: This is a disaster. Pulling out NOW, Commander.

column2: We have a lock on the target vehicles. They should be to your front. Engage and destroy, Commander.
column3: We have a lock on the target vehicles. They should be to your front. Engage and destroy, Commander.

column2: That's got it, keep firing on those targets until they are neutralized.
column3: That's got it, keep firing on those targets until they are neutralized.

column2: That's the last of the escorts. The rest should just be cleanup.
column3: That's the last of the escorts. The rest should just be cleanup.

column2: The convoy is escaping, Commander! We're not going to get another shot at this interception so move!
column3: The convoy is escaping, Commander! We're not going to get another shot at this interception so move!

column2: One down. Keep engaging those threats and we'll be out of here.
column3: One down. Keep engaging those threats and we'll be out of here.

column2: The convoy is finished, now get what 'mechs you have to the extraction point and we'll pull you out. Move quickly.
column3: The convoy is finished, now get what 'mechs you have to the extraction point and we'll pull you out. Move quickly.

column2: Enemy Reinforcements, get ready for contact.
column3: Enemy Reinforcements, get ready for contact.

column2: The message seems to be at least as important as the cargo. If we clean up the escorts to ensure their salvage crew's safety, there's a bonus in it for us.
column3: The message seems to be at least as important as the cargo. If we clean up the escorts to ensure their salvage crew's safety, there's a bonus in it for us.

column2: Destroy the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Convoy
column3: Destroy the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Convoy

column2: Defeat the Convoy Escorts
column3: Defeat the Convoy Escorts

column2: Stop Convoy From Escaping
column3: Stop Convoy From Escaping

column2: Intercept the Convoy
column3: Intercept the Convoy

column2: Get to the Evac Zone
column3: Get to the Evac Zone

column2: Destroy Enemy Reinforcement Units
column3: Destroy Enemy Reinforcement Units

column2: A {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} convoy was ambushed and looted for expensive industrial materials, and the perpetrators, {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name}, are moving the stolen goods to a secure location. We'd like you to strike the convoy and destroy it; our salvage teams will then retrieve our goods from the wreckage.
column3: A {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} convoy was ambushed and looted for expensive industrial materials, and the perpetrators, {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name}, are moving the stolen goods to a secure location. We'd like you to strike the convoy and destroy it; our salvage teams will then retrieve our goods from the wreckage.

column2: Terrorist Convoy
column3: Terrorist Convoy

column2: The {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} convoy is inbound, Commander.
column3: The {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} convoy is inbound, Commander.

column2: Let's find and intercept the vehicles before they escape the trap.
column3: Let's find and intercept the vehicles before they escape the trap.

column2: Then we'll extract at our designated location.
column3: Then we'll extract at our designated location.

column2: Good luck, Commander. Oliveira out.
column3: Good luck, Commander. Oliveira out.

column2: Well done, Commander. Let's head home and get something to drink.
column3: Well done, Commander. Let's head home and get something to drink.

column2: Time to call this one off, Commander. I'm scrubbing the mission.
column3: Time to call this one off, Commander. I'm scrubbing the mission.

column2: We have a lock on the target vehicles. They should be to your front. Engage and destroy, Commander.
column3: We have a lock on the target vehicles. They should be to your front. Engage and destroy, Commander.

column2: That's got it, keep firing on those targets until they are neutralized.
column3: That's got it, keep firing on those targets until they are neutralized.

column2: You've eliminated the guard units. Continue and clear the area; let's get out of this political entanglement quickly.
column3: You've eliminated the guard units. Continue and clear the area; let's get out of this political entanglement quickly.

column2: The convoy is reaching its escape point, Commander. We're running out of time, here. Get it done!
column3: The convoy is reaching its escape point, Commander. We're running out of time, here. Get it done!

column2: One down. Keep engaging those threats and we'll be out of here.
column3: One down. Keep engaging those threats and we'll be out of here.

column2: The convoy is finished, now get what 'mechs you have to the extraction point and we'll pull you out. Move quickly.
column3: The convoy is finished, now get what 'mechs you have to the extraction point and we'll pull you out. Move quickly.

column2: Enemy Reinforcements, get ready for contact.
column3: Enemy Reinforcements, get ready for contact.

column2: Commander, this smells political, and that makes me nervous. I suggest we go in, take care of the convoy, and get out again, without too many questions. There's a bonus from {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName} if we clean up all the enemy forces, but that's up to you.
column3: Commander, this smells political, and that makes me nervous. I suggest we go in, take care of the convoy, and get out again, without too many questions. There's a bonus from {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName} if we clean up all the enemy forces, but that's up to you.

column2: Destroy the Terrorist Supply Convoy
column3: Destroy the Terrorist Supply Convoy

column2: Destroy the Convoy Guards
column3: Destroy the Convoy Guards

column3: Stop Convoy From Escaping

column2: Intercept the Supply Convoy
column3: Intercept the Supply Convoy

column2: Get to the Evac Zone
column3: Get to the Evac Zone

column2: Destroy Enemy Reinforcement Units
column3: Destroy Enemy Reinforcement Units

column2: Terrorist strikes against our facilities have increased, and our intel says {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} is bankrolling the terrorists and providing logistical support in the form of small arms, explosives, and medical supplies. We need you to intercept the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} supply convoy and destroy it before it reaches the terrorists.
column3: Terrorist strikes against our facilities have increased, and our intel says {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} is bankrolling the terrorists and providing logistical support in the form of small arms, explosives, and medical supplies. We need you to intercept the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} supply convoy and destroy it before it reaches the terrorists.

column2: Thorny Problem
column3: Thorny Problem

column2: This is as close as I can get you without tripping every early warning system in the area. If you move up to here, you should be able to see the targets.
column3: This is as close as I can get you without tripping every early warning system in the area. If you move up to here, you should be able to see the targets.

column2: The escorts are optional targets, Commander, but knocking them out would make our employers happy, and we'll get a bonus.
column3: The escorts are optional targets, Commander, but knocking them out would make our employers happy, and we'll get a bonus.

column2: Once you've wrapped this up, I'll pick your lance up at this LZ, Commander.
column3: Once you've wrapped this up, I'll pick your lance up at this LZ, Commander.

column2: Straightforward and successful: my favorite kind of mission.
column3: Straightforward and successful: my favorite kind of mission.

column2: I don't know what happened down there, Commander. Let's debrief back in orbit.
column3: I don't know what happened down there, Commander. Let's debrief back in orbit.

column2: We have a lock on the target vehicles. They should be to your front. Engage and destory, Commander.
column3: We have a lock on the target vehicles. They should be to your front. Engage and destory, Commander.

column2: That's got it, keep firing on those targets until they are neutralized.
column3: That's got it, keep firing on those targets until they are neutralized.

column2: That's the escorts down, Commander. I'm not seeing any more 'Mech signatures in the AO.
column3: That's the escorts down, Commander. I'm not seeing any more 'Mech signatures in the AO.

column2: That bonus is ours, assuming we take out the convoy.
column3: That bonus is ours, assuming we take out the convoy.

column2: Boss, those vehicles are about to leave the AO. If we lose them, we don't get paid.
column3: Boss, those vehicles are about to leave the AO. If we lose them, we don't get paid.

column2: One down. Keep engaging those threats and we'll be out of here.
column3: One down. Keep engaging those threats and we'll be out of here.

column2: The convoy is finished, now get what mechs you have to the extraction point and we'll pull you out. Move quickly.
column3: The convoy is finished, now get what mechs you have to the extraction point and we'll pull you out. Move quickly.

column2: Enemy Reinforcements, get ready for contact.
column3: Enemy Reinforcements, get ready for contact.

column2: It's a solid plan, Commander, as long as they're right about the light defenses.
column3: It's a solid plan, Commander, as long as they're right about the light defenses.

column3: The objective for destroying the convoy units.

column3: The objective for killing the additional units that ambush you.

column2: Destroy {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Reinforcements
column3: Destroy {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Reinforcements

column2: The {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} control of this world is nearly absolute. We've identified a point of vulnerability, however: they move supplies and weapons by convoy, and those convoys are lightly defended by a single lance of 'Mechs. If we destroy enough of their supply convoys, their other operations will be weakened enough for our forces to move in and take advantage of their fragility. We don't want to tip our hand, however, so we'd like you to engage in a little guerilla warfare on our behalf.
column3: The {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} control of this world is nearly absolute. We've identified a point of vulnerability, however: they move supplies and weapons by convoy, and those convoys are lightly defended by a single lance of 'Mechs. If we destroy enough of their supply convoys, their other operations will be weakened enough for our forces to move in and take advantage of their fragility. We don't want to tip our hand, however, so we'd like you to engage in a little guerilla warfare on our behalf.

column2: Once you've wrapped this up, I'll pick your lance up at-- uh, Darius? Do you see those engine signatures?
column3: Once you've wrapped this up, I'll pick your lance up at-- uh, Darius? Do you see those engine signatures?

column2: Affirmative, Meyer. Commander, be warned; there may be additional enemy forces in the field. Dammit.
column3: Affirmative, Meyer. Commander, be warned; there may be additional enemy forces in the field. Dammit.

column2: Well, despite the unexpected second lance, that was straightforward and successful.
